sentences.sContent: Before you blow up and say something you'll regret later - count to ten.
sentences.sContent_eng: Before you blow up and say something you'll regret later - count to ten.
sentences.sCn: 在你自我膨胀并说出一些会后悔的话之前——先数到十吧。

sentences.sContent: Just count to ten and then consider whether or not you should make that purchase.
sentences.sContent_eng: Just count to ten and then consider whether or not you should make that purchase.
sentences.sCn: 数到十然后再考虑一下你是否购买。
